title: Chad Loves Michelle
overview: Chad Loves Michelle features an inside look at the marriage between Grammy Award-winning singer Michelle Williams, who is part of Destiny's Child, and Chad Johnson, a sports chaplain to various professional sports organizations. The newly engaged couple have been together for a year but have never spent more than seven days in the same city together. Both are relocating to Los Angeles and sit down with a pre-marriage counselor to help them adjust to their lives together. Each episode features real issues that the couple face in their everyday life.Â
